name: The Legada Galaxy
description:
To play the game, simply start the Unity Window and go. The game has a sudden start, so you have to be ready to go when you see the Red Spaceship load. Fly around and rescue the aliens from their boxes and from floating in space, but avoid the asteroids in order to keep your health or shoot them away. A Blue Spaceship is chasing you around while you attempt to complete your tasks and if it catches you, you are dead instantly.

The Controls:

W-Forward

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

Space - Shoot Bullets
